title: Loan Default Prediction Model
description: The model was created to compete in Coursera's Dataset Challenge. It was ranked in the 88th percentile.
longDescription: An XGBoost decision trees machine learning model developed to predict loan defaults using various financial indicators. The model was trained on a dataset provided by Coursera and achieved a ranking in the 88th percentile during the competition.
highlights: Ranked in the 88th percentile in Coursera's Dataset Challenge
Uses XGBoost for decision tree modeling

title: Studize Mobile App
description: This project is a minature calendar application facilitating an easy way to manage academic tasks and schedules.
longDescription: This is a front-end mobile app developed using Flutter, designed to help students manage their academic tasks and schedules efficiently. It features a user-friendly interface with the ability to view their academic calendar and manage study sessions.
highlights: Calendar view allows for the viewing of projects

title: VITCL Flutter Application
description: This project aims to create a platform through which players from VIT could register and play chess seamlessly.
longDescription: This is a front-end mobile app developed using Flutter, designed to facilitate chess players from VIT to register and play games seamlessly. The app provides a user-friendly interface for players to manage their profiles and participate in chess matches.
highlights: Allows registration and participation in chess matches
Able to view upcoming matches and results
